content: CP 660 Flexible firestop foam Easy-to-install flexible firestop foam to help create a fire and smoke barrier around for cable and mixed penetrations ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile – single cables, bundles, trays, trunking and mixed penetrations (metal and plastic pipes) Future-proof – re-penetrable to allow future cable capacity increases Easily shaped during curing phase – leftovers can be cut and reused Single-sided installation possible Simpler – no additional sealing or backfilling material needed Applications Electrical: Cable, cable bundles, cable trays and cable trunkings. Mixed penetrations. Repenetration of single cables. Combi approvals with CFS-BL blocks especially for large openings or special segment applications (telecom, industrial) Mechanical: Non combustible (metal) pipes with mineral wool / non flammable insulation. Small combustible (plastic) pipes. No smoke/gastight additional sealing and no backing material required. Can be used for LAR applications Combustable pipes up to 110 mm, with firesetop collar Conduits and conduit bundles For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approx. cure time: 10 min Application temperature range: 50 - 95 °F Color: Red Technical Data | Approx. cure time | 10 min | 1 | Application temperature range | 50 - 95 °F | Color | Red | Content per can/cartridge | 325 ml | Chemical basis | Two component polyurethane foam | Foam Yield (up to) | 128 in³ | Required dispenser | HDM 330, HDE 500, HDM 500 | LEED VOC | 26 g/l | Storage and transportation temperature range | 40 - 77 °F | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 140 °F | at 75°F/24°C, 50% relative humidity ### ITEMS- 203517 - CP 660 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack - 1x Mixer - 3613677 - 1-Case includes 16 tubes with HDM 500 & Black Cartridge - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDM 500 Dispenser assy - 16x Foil pack - 16x Mixer - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3613676 - 1 - Case includes 16 tubes - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 16x Foil pack - 16x Mixer
